SENT.plain: This paper introduces an algorithm for detecting T wave alternans (TWA) using Poincare mapping method, which is a technique for nonlinear dynamic systems to display periodic behavior
Vector angle index (VAI) was used to determine the presence or absence of TWA
Adopting MIT/BIH Arrhythmia database and European ECG ST-T database to simulate, we used VAI via poincare mapping method for correlation analysis with Vtwa by way of the spectral method
The cross-correlation coefficient between Vtwa and VAI is gamma = 0.860 1
The algorithm can identify the absence and presence of TWA accurately and provide idea for further study of TWA
